overview: A portrait study of Shereen Maloney's mother Irene. Irene talks about growing older and says that she feels just as wide- eyed and interested in things now as she did when she was 20. She talks about her first job and the wonderful feeling of independence it brought her. The film follows her daily activities as she drives a Fiat Bambina through the city and plays with her grandchild.
title: Irene – 59
